concept.title: Financial services for DK PIN methods

titlealts.searchtitle: (): Financial services for DK PIN methods

concept.shortdesc: The German Banking Industry Committee, Deutsche Kreditwirtschaft (DK) specifies PIN methods and requirements for financial services.

conbody.p: DK is an association of the German banking industry. The intellectual property rights regarding the methods and specification belong to the German Banking Industry Committee.
conbody.note: All cryptographic coprocessors must be loaded with the same level of code. There are several licensed internal code (LIC) releases in support of the DK PIN methods. Ensure that all of the coprocessors have the same LIC level to support the function you want to use.
conbody.p: The following financial services (verbs) are described in this topic:
